definition: to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters

sentences.english: The reference and Citation in academic papers closely relate to intellectual property.
sentences.chinese: 学述论著中的参考引文与知识产权有着密切的关系。

sentences.english: Some dictionary writer use citation to show what word mean.
sentences.chinese: 有些辞典的编纂者用引文作例证以解释词义。

sentences.english: It is everybody else's quotations except Cloverleaf's and they have been collected by me for many years.
sentences.chinese: 这是除了他们为我收集立体式引文许多年。

sentences.english: Inter-citation by the historical documents is the important basis and evidence to make an analysis of citations.
sentences.chinese: 科学文献的相互引用关系是引文分析的主要依据。

sentences.english: I finally tracked down the reference in a dictionary of quotations .
sentences.chinese: 我终于在引语词典中查到了那段引文。

sentences.english: IT HAS become a custom of bloggers to find an intriguing quotation for Independence Day.
sentences.chinese: 为独立日找有趣的引文已成为博主们的习俗。
“这段引文非常有趣，”西王母说。

sentences.english: Objective: To study the characteristics of citations in Chinese Journal of Stomatology.
sentences.chinese: 了解《中华口腔医学杂志》载文中引文的特点。

sentences.english: Cut and paste this quotation from the first paragraph into the middle of our essay.
sentences.chinese: 你将这段引文从第一段剪贴到我们文章的中间。

sentences.english: Argonne is also ranked sixth in the world on the list of high-impact citations.
sentences.chinese: 阿贡也是排名世界第六位高影响引文列表。

sentences.english: All quotations from Latin texts are given in translation.
sentences.chinese: 所有引自拉丁语本白勺引文都经过翻译。

sentences.english: Statistic analysis of the citation is one of the most important methods in bibliometrics.
sentences.chinese: 引文统计分析是文献计量学的一个重要方法。

sentences.english: This quotation is taken from a newspaper article.
sentences.chinese: 这段引文是从报上抄录来的。

sentences.english: Her lecture was overweighted with quotations .
You fitly begin with an elegant quotation .
sentences.chinese: 你用一句绝妙的引文很恰当地开始。

sentences.english: I seem to recognize the quotation, but I cannot pin it down to its author.
sentences.chinese: 这句引文我仿佛见过，但我不能确定它的作者是谁。

definition: marginal notes/annotation/to annotate/to add comments to text
to cite/to quote/to cite as evidence
to quote/to cite/to recommend/to appoint/(computing) reference
clauses and sub-clauses (in formal document)/entry (in a dictionary, encyclopedia etc)
